scripts.restart: docker compose down && docker compose up --build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json apps/backend/node_modules apps/frontend/node_modules && npm cache clean --force
scripts.clean:docker: docker system prune -af && docker builder prune -af && docker volume prune -f && docker rmi $(docker images -q) || true
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:docker
scripts.restart:docker: npm run clean:docker && docker compose down && docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose up
